pe7:1.6_0: Tattha yena cha puggalamūlāni tesaṁ nikkhipetvā rāgacarito,
pe7:1.6_7: iti imesaṁ puggalānaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjitānaṁ pañca nīvaraṇāni paṭipakkho tesaṁ paṭighātāya yathā asamattho tīṇi akusalamūlāni niggaṇhāti.
pe7:1.7_0: Lobhena akusalamūlena abhijjhā ca uddhaccañca uppilavataṁ alobhena kusalamūlena niggaṇhāti,
pe7:1.8_0: Doso ca thinamiddhañca dosapakkho, taṁ adosena niggaṇhāti.
pe7:2.4_0: Tattha alobhassa pāripūriyā vivitto hoti kāmehi.
pe7:2.5_0: Tattha adosassa pāripūriyā amohassa pāripūriyā ca vivitto hoti pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi,
pe7:2.5_1: savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
pe7:3.3_0: Tattha paṭhamābhinipāto vitakko, paṭiladdhassa vicaraṇaṁ vicāro.
pe7:3.4_0: Yathā puriso dūrato purisaṁ passati āgacchantaṁ,
pe7:3.4_1: na ca tāva jānāti eso itthīti vā purisoti vā yadā tu paṭilabhati itthīti vā purisoti vā evaṁ vaṇṇoti
pe7:3.4_2: vā evaṁ saṇṭhānoti vā ime vitakkayanto uttari upaparikkhanti kiṁ nu kho ayaṁ sīlavā udāhu dussīlo aḍḍho
pe7:3.5_0: Evaṁ vicāro vitakke appeti, vicāro cariyati ca anuvattati ca.
pe7:3.6_0: Yathā pakkhī pubbaṁ āyūhati pacchā nāyūhati yathā āyūhanā evaṁ vitakko,
pe7:3.6_1: yathā pakkhānaṁ pasāraṇaṁ evaṁ vicāro anupālati vitakketi vicarati vicāreti.
pe7:3.8_0: Kāmasaññāya paṭipakkho vitakko, byāpādasaññāya vihiṁsasaññāya ca paṭipakkho vicāro.
pe7:3.9_0: Vitakkānaṁ kammaṁ akusalassa amanasikāro, vicārānaṁ kammaṁ jeṭṭhānaṁ saṁvāraṇā.
pe7:3.10_0: Yathā paliko tuṇhiko sajjhāyaṁ karoti evaṁ vitakko, yathā taṁyeva anupassati evaṁ vicāro.
pe7:3.14_0: Kallitā kosallattaṁ cittassa vitakko, abhinīhārakosallaṁ cittassa vicāro.
pe7:3.15_0: Idaṁ kusalaṁ idaṁ akusalaṁ idaṁ bhāvetabbaṁ idaṁ pahātabbaṁ idaṁ sacchikātabbanti vitakko,
pe7:3.15_1: yathā pahānañca bhāvanā ca sacchikiriyā ca evaṁ vicāro.
pe7:3.16_0: Imesu vitakkavicāresu ṭhitassa duvidhaṁ dukkhaṁ na uppajjati kāyikañca cetasikañca;
pe7:3.18_0: Iti vitakkajanitaṁ cetasikaṁ sukhaṁ pīti kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ kāyikoyeva.
pe7:3.19_0: Yā tattha cittassa ekaggatā, ayaṁ samādhi.
pe7:4.1_0: Tesaṁyeva vitakkavicārānaṁ abhikkhaṇaṁ āsevanāya tassa tappoṇamānasaṁ hoti.
pe7:4.4_0: Api ca samādhijā pīti rati ca jāyati.
pe7:4.11_0: Yā pīti, taṁ somanassindriyaṁ, yaṁ sukhaṁ, taṁ sukhindriyaṁ.
pe7:4.14_0: So pītiyā virāgā yāti ojahi jallasahagataṁ.
pe7:5.1_0: Tattha somanassacittamupādānanti ca so taṁ vicinanto upekkhameva manasikaroti.
pe7:5.3_0: Yathā ca pītiyā sukhamānitaṁ, taṁ kāyena paṭisaṁvedeti sampajāno viharati.
pe7:6.1_0: Tathā kāyikassa sukhassa pahānāya paṭhame jhāne somanassindriyaṁ nirujjhati.
pe7:6.3_0: So sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ
pe7:6.4_0: Tattha catūhi indriyehi upekkhā pasādā hoti,
pe7:6.5_1: tattha sukhindriyena somanassindriyena ca asati hoti,
pe7:6.5_6: sato sampajāno cittekaggatā ca idaṁ vuccate ca catutthaṁ jhānaṁ.
pe7:7.1_0: Tattha yo rāgacarito puggalo tassa sukhindriyañca somanassindriyañca;
pe7:7.2_0: yo dosacarito puggalo tassa dukkhindriyañca domanassindriyañca;
pe7:7.3_0: yo mohacarito puggalo tassa asati ca asampajaññañca.
pe7:8.1_0: Tattha rāgacaritassa puggalassa tatiye jhāne catutthe ca anunayo nirujjhati,
pe7:8.1_1: dosacaritassa paṭhame jhāne dutiye ca paṭighaṁ nirujjhati,
pe7:8.1_2: mohacaritassa puggalassa paṭhame jhāne dutiye ca asampajaññaṁ nirujjhati.
pe7:8.2_0: Tatiye jhāne catutthe ca asati nirujjhati,
pe7:8.2_1: evameva tesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ puggalānaṁ cattāri jhānāni vodānaṁ gamissanti.
pe7:9.1_0: Tattha rāgadosacaritassa puggalassa asampajaññañca anunayo ca paṭighañca,
pe7:9.2_0: Tattha rāgamohacaritassa puggalassa anunayattaṁ ca ādīnavaṁ dassitā,
pe7:9.3_0: Tattha dosamohacaritassa puggalassa paṭigho ca asati ca asampajaññañca ādīnavaṁ dassitā tena tassa hānabhāgiyaṁ jhānaṁ hoti.
pe7:10.1_0: Tattha rāgadosamohasamabhāgacaritassa puggalassa visesabhāgiyaṁ jhānaṁ hoti,
pe7:10.1_1: imāni cattāri jhānāni sattasu puggalesu niddisitabbāni.
pe7:10.2_0: Catūsu ca samādhīsu chandasamādhinā paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ,
pe7:10.4_0: Kāmavitakkabyāpādānañca taṁ taṁ vūpasamena paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ hoti,
pe7:10.6_0: Imāni cattāri jhānāni saṅkhepaniddesena niddiṭṭhāni, tattha samādhindriyaṁ pāripūriṁ gacchati.
pe7:10.7_1: tattha yo paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ nissāya āsavakkhayaṁ pāpuṇāti,
pe7:10.8_0: Yo dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ nissāya āsavānaṁ khayaṁ pāpuṇāti,
pe7:10.9_0: Yo tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ nissāya āsavānaṁ khayaṁ pāpuṇāti,
pe7:10.10_0: Yo catutthaṁ jhānaṁ nissāya āsavānaṁ khayaṁ pāpuṇāti,
pe7:10.10_1: so sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya sukhindriyapaṭipakkhena gato.
